title: Role of transition metals in coinage metal nanoclusters for the remediation of toxic dyes in aqueous systems
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,11411-11428
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA00931B, Review Article
Open Access

Priyanka Sharma, Mainak Ganguly, Mamta Sahu
Coinage metal nanoclusters are doped with transition metals to obtain an efficient photocatalyst and adsorbent for the removal of toxic dyes.
